title: cry for help ! how can I claim my european warranty for pixel 3a !
content:
I am suffering like all other users from a broken audio after upgrade to android 11. 
all online recommended aid does not work. 
my phone is under European warranty.
I want to claim this.
The recommended online return page does NOT work : https://store.google.com/de/repair
if you click on chat or call, you are redirected to a page that is not working !
google, get your act together !
